pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Adds an X.org configuration file to select the 'armada' driver, with entadrm acceleration (this is the current default for shipping Novena boards at the time of writing, and does not rely on galcore, or any firmware, kernel or userspace blobs). See the package x11-drivers/xf86-video-armada for further details.
You can omit this package if you like; if not installed, your Novena will default to using the 'modesetting' driver, which provides adequate performance for day-to-day use.
